amendment.description: An amendment numbered 284 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase funding for the Low or No Emission Grant Program by $6 million to promote state emission responsibility and reduces funding for Buses and Bus Facilities Competitive Grants by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Malinowski amendment (A094) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Malinowski amendment (A094) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A094) offered by Mr. Malinowski.
